name: Christopher J. Helbert
text: Wonderful local pizzeria. Wonderful food. Very friendly staff. Great prices, especially their Friday specials.

name: Dakota Shortridge
text: They are just like all the other Pizza Pluses in SWVA.  They are a little pricey. The food is ok, but they do have a lot of options to choose from.

name: terry lester
text: was there yesterday they gave me  the wrong food,we called they said to bring it back,they took it back  in the store after I handled  on it,i  wonder if they sent it back out the window, I thought they weren't suppose to take food back in after it went out, could make  people sick in the time we're living in with all this going on.

name: Cynthia Clifton
text: Me and my family eat here at least once a month. We usually do delivery and our food is always hot. Delivery is fast and our orders are always correct.

name: C K
text: Pizza is very good here. Love the thin crust. Good service, occasionally slow. But normally a really good place to stop and get a slice.

name: donnie arnold
text: salad bar great pizza's is to thin not enough on them needs to change sauces

name: Darrell Twowaters
text: Love the food.

name: Dazey Xtreme Fury
text: My sandwich was okay, at least I could eat it. The bacon cheddar fries and chicken fries however were hard as a rock and disgusting.  Had to throw them away.  Waste of $20 and never ordering from there again.

name: Teddy Keen
text: The pizza was very fresh on the buffet. The service was outstanding. This is my favorite pizza plus overall. As We where leaving the manager took the time to make sure we got Togo cups, It was very kind of here.

name: ChenelleBell74 Kiser
text: Good customer service, food is prepared correct and typically I dont have to wait more than 20 minutes for a call in order.

name: Patricia Lindsey
text: When we first moved to Lebanon, Virginia, we were told that Pizza Town had the best pizza. In my and my roommate's opinions, this is not true. Pizza Plus has the better pizza by far. In fact, all of their menu items are superior. They are clean, fast and extremely reasonably priced...plus, they have deserts! Thanks for asking...Trish

name: Bryan Tinsley
text: Surprisingly good.  Great lunch buffet with nice clean salad bar.  Pizza was yummy and good service.

name: Lin Mcc
text: Ordered 3 salads. They had a foul taste, as though vegetables were old. The diced ham had a bad flavor as well. Wouldn't recommend the salad bar.

name: Moon Shadow
text: Very good pizza and salad bar. I believe we are becoming somewhat regulars here. Good staff and reasonable prices.

name: Kay J Carp
text: Very clean restaurant with the cleanest bathroom I've probably been in in a public setting. They also have good food with fresh ingredients. The employees are always extremely nice and very friendly. It is one of the best pizza restaurants in Lebanon, VA! Stop by and try anything on the menu its pretty much all good!

name: joshua boyd
text: Great service. Reasonable prices

name: Nick Hansen
text: Excellent and fast service. Food was prepared and presented well to the table. Great experience.

name: Gracie Howard
text: Good food at a good price

name: Sherman Fletcher
text: Friendly staff great service and great food!!!

name: Pat Monk
text: Pizza was good and hot everything on bar was very good..

name: gamers boys
text: Great pizza for your ðŸ’µ

text: Well for one my DAUGHTER IS my hero and she works there and she is a great worker

name: judy austin
text: Love their Ice cream sundae!

name: Aidan plays 12
text: Computers crashed waited 20 extra mins and still left put my dressing after specifically asking if they got it.

name: its a trill squad
text: There pizza is soo good

name: hope williams
text: Always fast service and friendly people

name: Rebecca Goebel
text: My favorite pizza in the world.

name: Robin Freeman
text: Attentive waitstaff, even for the buffet. Nicely chopped veggies on the salad bar. They take requests foe the pizza buffet and keep fresh hot pizzas out.

name: Michael Harris
text: My first time here and it was great hot fresh and um good

name: Majesstik sky collins
text: There was a good selection and the service was AMAZING... I highly recomen to all to eat there... If your in the mood for pizza or if you are just wanting a salad then Pizza Plus is where you want to be.... There salad bar is by far the â€¦More

name: Joseph Greene
text: Always a clean place with very friendly workers! The pizza and salad bars are always fresh! Best pizza place in town!

name: Gloria Holbrook
text: Good food and delivery didn't take forever. Delivery driver was very nice and professional. Plus it's the only place around here with delivery.

name: Paul Street
text: Food and service are always great here.

name: Elaine Sutherland
text: Food is always great. Best salad bar around

name: Jackie Looney
text: Food great place clean waiter remarkable

name: Pam Chambers

name: rosa bell
text: Had my nephews Birthday party here they great people willing to help you as best they can an stay ontop of service

name: Mary Monk
text:
Chris blecher is a great server! fast and great service.
But on the other your online ordering really needs to be fix can't order from Lebanon store.
